Attribute.AttributeName: [System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Class)]
[<System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Class)>]

summary.span: 指定服务协定实现的内部执行行为。

span.span: Specifies the internal execution behavior of a service contract implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性应用于服务实现，以指定服务范围的执行行为。Apply the attribute to a service implementation to specify service-wide execution behavior. (若要在方法级别指定执行行为，请使用 属性。 ) 此属性只能应用于服务实现。(To specify execution behavior at the method level, use the attribute.) This attribute can be applied only to service implementations. 有关工作示例，请参阅 [服务：行为示例](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms751453(v=vs.90))。For working examples, see the [Service: Behaviors Samples](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms751453(v=vs.90)). 属性是 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 编程模型功能，用于实现开发人员无需实现的通用功能。 properties are a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) programming model feature that enables common features that developers otherwise have to implement. 有关这些和其他行为的详细信息，请参阅 [指定服务运行时行为](/dotnet/framework/wcf/specifying-service-run-time-behavior)。For more information about these and other behaviors, see [Specifying Service Run-Time Behavior](/dotnet/framework/wcf/specifying-service-run-time-behavior). 有关以下某些属性集的基础运行时属性的详细信息，请参阅 [扩展 ServiceHost 和服务模型层](/dotnet/framework/wcf/extending/extending-servicehost-and-the-service-model-layer)。For more information about the underlying runtime properties that some of the following properties set, see [Extending ServiceHost and the Service Model Layer](/dotnet/framework/wcf/extending/extending-servicehost-and-the-service-model-layer). - 属性指定筛选器的类型，调度程序系统使用该类型的筛选器来查找处理请求的终结点。The property specifies the type of filter that the dispatcher system uses to locate the endpoint that handles requests. - 属性会在通道关闭且服务已处理完所有剩余消息时自动关闭会话。The property automatically closes the session when the channel is closed and the service has finished processing any remaining messages. - 属性可控制内部线程模型，使系统可以支持可重入或多线程服务。The property controls the internal threading model, enabling support for reentrant or multithreaded services. - 属性用来声明一个名称，以便在配置文件中 `name` 元素的 `` 属性中使用。The property is used to declare a name for use in the `name` attribute of the `` element in a configuration file. - 属性使系统可以在运行时忽略处理消息时不需要的额外序列化信息。The property enables the run time to ignore extra serialization information that is not required to process the message. - 属性指定服务中未经处理的异常是否要作为 SOAP 错误返回。The property specifies whether unhandled exceptions in a service are returned as SOAP faults. 此属性仅用于调试目的。This is for debugging purposes only. - 属性指定在与客户端交换期间是否回收，以及何时回收服务及其服务对象。The property specifies whether and when services and their service objects are to be recycled during an exchange with a client. - 属性限制对象图中要序列化的项数。The property to limit on the number of items in an object graph that are serialized. - 和 属性控制服务元素的 WSDL 表达式的名称和命名空间。The and properties control the name and namespace for the WSDL expression of the service element. - 属性指定当事务完成后是否回收服务对象。The property specifies whether the service object is recycled when a transaction completes. - 属性指定会话关闭时是否完成未处理的事务。The property specifies whether outstanding transactions are completed when the session closes. - 属性指定协定支持的事务隔离级别。The property specifies the transaction isolation level that the contract supports. - 属性指定必须完成事务的时间段，超过该时间段，事务将中止。The property specifies the time period within which a transaction must complete or it aborts. - 属性指示是否自动同步入站方法调用与用户界面线程。The property indicates whether to synchronize inbound method calls with the user interface thread automatically. - 属性通知系统它是否应确认标记为 `MustUnderstand` 的 SOAP 标头是否确实已被理解。The property informs the system whether it should confirm that SOAP headers marked as `MustUnderstand` have, in fact, been understood. 属性也可以使用应用程序配置文件进行设置。The property can also be set using an application configuration file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For details, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 属性。The following code example demonstrates the properties. `BehaviorService` 类使用 属性以指示：The `BehaviorService` class uses the attribute to indicate that: - 事务完成后，回收服务对象。The service object is recycled when the transaction completes. - 每个会话都有一个服务对象。There is one service object for each session. - 服务是单线程服务，不支持可重入调用。The service is single-threaded and does not support reentrant calls. 而且，在操作级别， 值指示 `TxWork` 方法将自动登记到流事务中或创建新事务来做这项工作，并指示如果没有发生未经处理的异常，则自动提交此事务。Furthermore, at the operation level, the values indicate that the `TxWork` method automatically enlists in flowed transactions or creates a new transaction to do the work, and that the transaction is committed automatically if an unhandled exception does not occur. [!code-csharp[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/vb/services.vb#2)] 为了正确执行下面的代码示例，基础绑定必须支持流事务。The underlying binding must support flowed transactions for the following code example to execute properly. 例如，若要使用 支持流事务，请在代码或应用程序配置文件中将 属性设置为 `true`。To support flowed transactions using the , for example, set the property to `true` in code or in an application configuration file. 下面的代码示例演示上述示例的配置文件。The following code example shows the configuration file for the preceding sample. [!code-xml[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#1)]

summary.span: 指定在客户端关闭输出会话时是否自动关闭会话。

span.span: Specifies whether to automatically close a session when a client closes an output session.

value.span: 如果客户端关闭输出会话时服务自动关闭会话，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if services automatically close a session when the client closes an output session; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当客户端关闭输出会话且服务已处理完所有剩余消息时，服务器会关闭会话。By default when a client closes an output session and the service has finished processing any remaining messages the server closes the session. 将 设置为 `false` 可阻止服务器自动关闭会话，并启用会话生存期的自定义控件。Setting to `false` prevents the server from automatically closing the session and enables custom control of session lifetimes.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示服务是支持单线程、多线程还是支持可重入调用。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a service supports one thread, multiple threads, or reentrant calls.

value.span: 值之一，默认值为 。

span.span: One of the values; the default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示服务实例是可以处理单线程，还是可以同时执行多线程；如果是单线程，是否支持可重入。This property indicates whether an instance of a service can handle one thread or multiple threads that execute concurrently, and if single-threaded, whether reentrancy is supported. > [!NOTE] > 属性可与其他一些设置进行交互。The property interacts with some other settings. 例如，如果 值设置为 ，那么结果是您的服务一次只能处理一条消息，除非您还将 值设置为 。For example, if the value is set to the result is that your service can only process one message at a time unless you also set the value to . 此属性与 属性结合时也可生成行为。This property also produces behavior in combination with the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [会话、实例化和并发](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/sessions-instancing-and-concurrency)。For details, see [Sessions, Instancing, and Concurrency](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/sessions-instancing-and-concurrency). 将 设置为 ，可以指示系统将服务实例限制为一次只运行一个执行线程，如此一来，您就不必处理线程问题。Setting to instructs the system to restrict instances of the service to one thread of execution at a time, which frees you from dealing with threading issues. 如果值为 ，则意味着在任一时刻都可以通过多个线程来执行服务对象。A value of means that service objects can be executed by multiple threads at any one time. 在此情况下，必须确保线程安全。In this case, you must ensure thread safety. 还会限制对单个线程的访问一次。在处理操作时，任何其他消息都不能输入操作。 also restricts access to a single thread at a time; while the operation is processing, no other message can enter the operation. 如果在操作期间，放弃了对其他服务的调用，则当前消息将释放对该操作的锁定，这时将允许该操作处理其他消息。If during the operation a call to another service leaves, the current message loses the lock on the operation, which is free to process other messages. 如果对该服务的调出重新返回，则会重新建立锁定，并且会继续处理原始消息直到结束，或者直到操作又进行其他调用为止。When the service call out returns, the lock is reestablished and the original message can continue processing to its conclusion or until another call out of the operation occurs. > [!IMPORTANT] > 即使将 服务实例限制为一次执行一个线程，还必须将设置 为1以保证无序消息。Even though restricts instances of the service to one thread of execution at a time, you must also set to 1 to guarantee no out-of-order messages. > > 此外，您还需要在标注之前保持对象状态一致，并且必须确认操作本地数据在标注后有效。Also, it is your responsibility to leave your object state consistent before callouts and you must confirm that operation-local data is valid after callouts. 请注意，只有通过 WCF 通道调用其他服务，才能解锁服务实例。Note that the service instance is unlocked only by calling another service over a WCF channel. 在此情况下，已调用的服务可以通过回调重入第一个服务。In this case, the called service can reenter the first service via a callback. 如果第一个服务不可重入，则该调用顺序会导致死锁。If the first service is not reentrant, the sequence of calls results in a deadlock. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For details, see . 处理操作进行任何出站调用期间，可以修改对该操作而言非本地的数据。During any outbound call from a processing operation, data not local to the operation can be modified. 当原始消息恢复处理时， (本地状态数据保证有效。 ) 因此，在出站调用之前，必须确保非本地数据对其他传入调用有效，并在出站调用返回后重新验证非本地数据。(Local state data is guaranteed to be valid when the original message resumes processing.) As a result, before your outbound call you must ensure that non-local data is valid for other incoming calls and revalidate non-local data after the outbound call returns. 下面的伪代码演示要获得成功可重入支持必须使用的模式。The following pseudo-code illustrates the required pattern for successful reentrant support. ```csharp public void MyMethod() { this.SomeNonLocalDataState; // Here you need to clean nonlocal state for other users OutboundProxy proxy = new OutboundProxy(); int returnValue = proxy.CallOutOfOperation(); // Ensure that this.SomeNonLocalDataState is valid for continued use. this.ModifyNonLocalState; return returnValue; } ``` 当 为 时，对出站调用使用 Begin/End 异步调用模式会触发异常。Using the Begin/End asynchronous call pattern for an outbound call when the is triggers an exception. 在异步出站调用所需进行的操作中， 为 ，而在此情况下，必须处理同步问题。Asynchronous outbound calls require an operation in which is , in which case you must handle synchronization issues. 通常，如果到达的消息与实例的并发模式冲突，则该消息会等待，直到可使用实例或超时为止。Generally, if a message arrives for an instance that violates its concurrency mode, the message waits until the instance is available, or until it times out. 此外，如果 设置为 且可重入调用已在等待释放实例时被阻止，则系统会检测到死锁，并引发异常。In addition, if the is set to and a reentrant call is blocked while waiting for the instance to be freed, the system detects the deadlock and throws an exception. > [!NOTE] > 属性设置为 时，如果 `true` 为 ，则在运行时会引发 。A is thrown at runtime if is `true` when the property is set to . 请注意，如果有操作的 设置为 True，并且您将 `false` 设置为 ，请务必将 显式设置为 。Note that you must explicitly set to `false` if there is an operation with set to true and you set to . 否则，由于 的默认值为 `true`，因此将引发验证异常。Otherwise a validation exception is thrown because the default value of is `true`. 和其他属性之间的交互可能会更改运行时行为。There is an interaction of the and other properties that can alter runtime behavior. 有关这些交互的完整说明，请参阅 [会话、实例化和并发](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/sessions-instancing-and-concurrency)。For a complete description of these interactions, see [Sessions, Instancing, and Concurrency](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/sessions-instancing-and-concurrency). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用 、 与 之间的区别。The following code example demonstrates the different between using , , and . 此示例在未进行实际实现的情况下不进行编译，但它演示了 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 进行操作以及这对操作代码的意义。This sample does not compile without a real implementation behind it, but does demonstrate the kind of threading guarantees that Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) makes and what that means for your operation code. [!code-csharp[C_BestPractices-Concurrency#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_bestpractices-concurrency/cs/reentrantandmultiple.cs#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否将未知序列化数据发送到网络上。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to send unknown serialization data onto the wire.

value.span: 如果永不发送未知序列化数据，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if unknown serialization data is never sent; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果某个类型实现 接口，则它会存储在反序列化到该类型时通过网络传输的任何额外数据。If a type implements the interface, it stores any extra data it doesn't know about that comes over the wire when deserializing into that type. 例如，如果 `Person` 类型具有 `FirstName` 和 `LastName` 成员，且有一个名为 `PhoneNumber` 的元素进入，则系统会存储该元素。For example, if a type `Person` has members `FirstName` and `LastName`, and an element called `PhoneNumber` comes in, it is stored. 在以后序列化该类型时，会重新发出 `PhoneNumber`。When later serializing the type, `PhoneNumber` will be re-emitted. 问题在于 `Person` ，该服务所导出的架构只具有 `FirstName` 和 `LastName` ，因此 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 生成一个架构无效的实例！The problem is that the schema for `Person` exported by that service only has `FirstName` and `LastName`, so Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) generates a schema-invalid instance! 如果一定要严格遵从架构，则可以将 设置为 `true`，以关闭此重新发出行为。If strict schema compliance is important, you can set to `true` to turn this re-emitting behavior off. 不管 设置如何，WCF 都将始终处理) 中的已知数据 (，并在额外数据进入时不引发异常。Regardless setting, WCF always processes known data (both in and out) and does not throw exceptions when extra data comes in. 你还可以使用应用程序配置文件中的[ < dataContractSerializer > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element)元素来设置此属性。You can also set this property using the [<dataContractSerializer>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element) element in an application configuration file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 以及如何实现 。The following example shows the use of and an implementation of . 在此示例中， 设置为 `false`，如此客户端了解的额外数据将往返回客户端。In this sample, with set to `false`, the extra data that the client knows about is round-tripped back to the client. [!code-csharp[DCAContainerNoValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/dcacontainernovalidation/cs/services.cs#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否要将常规未处理执行异常转换为 类型的 并将其作为错误消息发送。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies that general unhandled execution exceptions are to be converted into a of type and sent as a fault message.

span.span: Set this to only during development to troubleshoot a service.

value.span: 如果未经处理的异常将作为 SOAP 错误返回，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if unhandled exceptions are to be returned as SOAP faults; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 设置为 `true`，可以使异常信息流入客户端，以便进行调试。Set to `true` to enable exception information to flow to clients for debugging purposes. 此属性需要支持请求响应或双工消息传递的绑定。This property requires a binding that supports either request-response or duplex messaging. 在所有托管应用程序中，处理错误由 对象表示。In all managed applications, processing errors are represented by objects. 在基于 SOAP 的应用程序（例如 WCF 应用程序）中，实现服务操作的方法使用 SOAP 错误消息来传递错误信息。In SOAP-based applications such as WCF applications, methods that implement service operations communicate error information using SOAP fault messages. 因为 WCF 应用程序在这两种类型的错误系统下执行，所以需要发送到客户端的任何托管异常信息都必须从异常转换为 SOAP 错误。Because WCF applications execute under both types of error systems, any managed exception information that needs to be sent to the client must be converted from exceptions into SOAP faults. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [在协定和服务中指定和处理错误](/dotnet/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services)。For more information, see [Specifying and Handling Faults in Contracts and Services](/dotnet/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services). 在开发期间，可能需要服务将其他异常发送回客户端，以协助调试。During development, you may want your service to also send other exceptions back to the client to assist you in debugging. 此功能仅用于开发，不应在已部署的服务中使用。This is a development-only feature and should not be employed in deployed services. 若要简化调试开发，请将设置 为 `true` 代码或使用应用程序配置文件。To facilitate debugging development, set the to `true` either in code or using an application configuration file. 当启用时，服务会自动将较安全的异常信息返回到调用方。When enabled, the service automatically returns safer exception information to the caller. 这些错误在客户端显示为 类型的 对象。These faults appear to the client as objects of type . > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果设置为，则 `true` 客户端可以获取有关内部服务方法异常的信息; 仅建议将其作为暂时调试服务应用程序的方法。Setting to `true` enables clients to obtain information about internal service method exceptions; it is only recommended as a way of temporarily debugging a service application. 此外，以这种方式返回未处理的托管异常的方法的 WSDL 并不包含类型为 的 的协定。In addition, the WSDL for a method that returns unhandled managed exceptions in this way does not contain the contract for the of type . 客户端必须预见到发生未知 SOAP 错误的可能性，以便正确获取调试信息。Clients must expect the possibility of an unknown SOAP fault to obtain the debugging information properly. `true`如以下代码示例所示，也可以使用应用程序配置文件和[ < serviceDebug > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug)元素将此属性设置为。Setting this property to `true` can also be done using an application configuration file and the [<serviceDebug>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug) element, as the following code example shows. [!code-xml[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#10)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 属性。The following code example demonstrates the properties. `BehaviorService` 类使用 属性以指示：The `BehaviorService` class uses the attribute to indicate that: - 在 UI 线程上调用实现方法。Implementation methods are invoked on the UI thread. - 每个会话都有一个服务对象。There is one service object for each session. - 服务是单线程服务，不支持可重入调用。The service is single-threaded and does not support reentrant calls. 而且，在操作级别， 值指示 `TxWork` 方法将自动登记到流事务中或创建新事务来做这项工作，并指示如果没有发生未经处理的异常，则自动提交此事务。Furthermore, at the operation level, the values indicate that the `TxWork` method automatically enlists in flowed transactions or creates a new transaction to do the work, and that the transaction is committed automatically if an unhandled exception does not occur. [!code-csharp[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/vb/services.vb#2)] 为了正确执行下面的代码示例，基础绑定必须支持流事务。The underlying binding must support flowed transactions for the following code example to execute properly. 例如，若要使用 支持流事务，请在代码或应用程序配置文件中将 属性设置为 `true`。To support flowed transactions using the , for example, set the property to `true` in code or in an application configuration file. 下面的代码示例演示上述示例的配置文件。The following code example shows the configuration file for the preceding sample. [!code-xml[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置指示新服务对象何时创建的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that indicates when new service objects are created.

value.span: 值之一；默认值为 。

span.span: One of the values; the default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性，可以指定新服务对象何时创建。Use the property to specify when new service objects are created. 如果服务对象没有直接连接到通信通道，服务对象的生存期将与客户端和服务应用程序之间的通道的生存期无关。Because the service object is not directly connected to the communicating channel, the lifetime of the service objects is independent of the lifetime of the channel between a client and the service application. 默认值 会构造服务应用程序，以在客户端和服务应用程序之间建立新的通信会话时，创建新的服务对象。The default value, , instructs the service application to create a new service object when a new communication session is established between a client and the service application. 相同会话中的后续调用由同一个对象处理。Subsequent calls in the same session are handled by the same object. 指示每一个服务对象都从一个客户端通道处理请求。 indicates that each service object handles requests from one client channel. > [!NOTE] > 属性可与其他一些设置进行交互。The property interacts with some other settings. 例如，如果 值设置为 ，那么结果是您的服务一次只能处理一条消息，除非您还将 值设置为 。For example, if the value is set to the result is that your service can only process one message at a time unless you also set the value to . 此属性与 属性结合时也可生成行为。This property also produces behavior in combination with the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [会话、实例化和并发](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/sessions-instancing-and-concurrency)。For details, see [Sessions, Instancing, and Concurrency](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/sessions-instancing-and-concurrency). 对于单一实例生存期行为（例如，如果主机应用程序调用 构造函数并传递一个对象以用作该服务），该服务类必须将 设置为 `Single`，否则运行时会引发异常。For singleton lifetime behavior (for example, if the host application calls the constructor and passes an object to use as the service), the service class must set to `Single`, or an exception is thrown at run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 属性。The following code example demonstrates the properties. `BehaviorService` 类使用 属性以指示：The `BehaviorService` class uses the attribute to indicate that: - 在 UI 线程上调用实现方法。Implementation methods are invoked on the UI thread. - 每个会话都有一个服务对象。There is one service object for each session. - 服务是单线程服务，不支持可重入调用。The service is single-threaded and does not support reentrant calls. 而且，在操作级别， 值指示 `TxWork` 方法将自动登记到流事务中或创建新事务来做这项工作，并指示如果没有发生未经处理的异常，则自动提交此事务。Furthermore, at the operation level, the values indicate that the `TxWork` method automatically enlists in flowed transactions or creates a new transaction to do the work, and that the transaction is committed automatically if an unhandled exception does not occur. [!code-csharp[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/vb/services.vb#2)] 为了正确执行下面的代码示例，基础绑定必须支持流事务。The underlying binding must support flowed transactions for the following code example to execute properly. 例如，若要使用 支持流事务，请在代码或应用程序配置文件中将 属性设置为 `true`。To support flowed transactions using the , for example, set the property to `true` in code or in an application configuration file. 下面的代码示例演示上述示例的配置文件。The following code example shows the configuration file for the preceding sample. [!code-xml[OperationBehaviorAttribute1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute1/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置序列化对象中允许的最大项数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of items allowed in a serialized object.

value.span: 对象中允许的最大项数。

span.span: The maximum number of items allowed in an object.

value.span: 默认值为 65536 字节 (64KB)。

span.span: The default is 65536 bytes (64KB).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性，可以限制对象图中要序列化的项数。Use the property set a limit on the number of items in an object graph that are serialized. 你还可以使用应用程序配置文件中的[ < dataContractSerializer > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element)元素来设置此属性。You can also set this property using the [<dataContractSerializer>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element) element in an application configuration file.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在完成当前事务后是否释放服务对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the service object is released when the current transaction completes.

value.span: 如果释放服务对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the service object is to be released; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，如果有操作的 设置为 True，并且您将 `false` 设置为 ，请务必将 显式设置为 。Note that you must explicitly set to `false` if there is an operation with set to true and you set to . 否则，由于 的默认值为 `true`，因此将引发验证异常。Otherwise a validation exception is thrown because the default value of is `true`. 此外，一定要了解如果服务是通过将服务对象传递给 构造函数来创建的，则会按照此属性的值为 `false` 来进行处理。In addition, it is important to realize that if the service is created by passing a service object to the constructor, the value of this property is treated as if it were `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将事务隔离级别设置为 ，不支持并发事务，并要求调用操作进行流事务。如果未发生未经处理的异常则自动提交服务的事务。The following code example sets the transaction isolation level to , disables support for concurrent transactions, requires a flowed transaction from the operation call, and commits the transaction on the service automatically if no unhandled exception occurs. [!code-csharp[SBA.Transactions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sba.transactions/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SBA.Transactions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/sba.transactions/vb/services.vb#2)] 为了正确执行下面的代码示例，基础绑定必须支持流事务。The underlying binding must support flowed transactions for the following code example to execute properly. 例如，若要使用 支持流事务，请在代码或应用程序配置文件中将 属性设置为 `true`。To support flowed transactions using the , for example, set the property to `true` in code or in an application configuration file. 下面的代码示例演示上述示例的配置文件。The following code example shows a configuration file for the preceding sample. [!code-xml[SBA.Transactions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sba.transactions/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#1)]

summary.span: 指定服务中新创建的事务和客户端传入的流事务的事务隔离级别。

span.span: Specifies the transaction isolation level for new transactions created inside the service, and incoming transactions flowed from a client.

span.span: A value that specifies the transaction isolation level.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 运行事务时所采用的隔离级别可确定在其他事务中进行更改时处理数据的方式，以及事务必须保持锁定以保护数据不被更改的时间长度。The isolation level in which your transaction runs determines how data is treated when changes are made in other transactions and how long your transaction must hold locks to protect against these changes. 例如，默认值 指定在事务完成之前不允许进行更新或插入。For example, the default value, , specifies that no updating or inserting can occur until the transaction is complete. 此属性也可以用于限制客户端传入的流事务的隔离级别。This property can also be used to restrict the isolation level of incoming transactions flowed from a client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将事务隔离级别设置为 ，不支持并发事务，并要求调用方法来进行流事务。如果未发生未经处理的异常则自动提交事务。The following code example sets the transaction isolation level to , does not support concurrent transactions, requires a flowed transaction from the method call, and commits the transaction automatically if no unhandled exception occurs. [!code-csharp[SBA.Transactions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sba.transactions/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SBA.Transactions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/sba.transactions/vb/services.vb#2)] 为了正确执行下面的代码示例，基础绑定必须支持流事务。The underlying binding must support flowed transactions for the following code example to execute properly. 例如，若要使用 支持流事务，请在代码或应用程序配置文件中将 属性设置为 `true`。To support flowed transactions using the , for example, set the property to `true` in code or in an application configuration file. 下面的代码示例演示上述示例的配置文件。The following code example shows a configuration file for the preceding sample. [!code-xml[SBA.Transactions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sba.transactions/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#1)]

span.span: The value is not one of the values.

summary.span: 获取或设置事务必须在此期间完成的时间段。

span.span: Gets or sets the period within which a transaction must complete.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示一个时间段，事务必须在此期间完成，否则会自动中止。

span.span: A object that represents the time within which transactions must complete or be automatically aborted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值设置 属性。This value sets the property. 你还可以使用应用程序配置文件中的[ < serviceTimeouts > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicetimeouts)元素来设置此属性。You can also set this property using the [<serviceTimeouts>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicetimeouts) element in an application configuration file. ## Examples 下面的配置文件指定事务超时期限为 3 分钟。The following configuration file specifies a transaction timeout period of three minutes. [!code-csharp[SBA.TransactionTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sba.transactiontimeout/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SBA.TransactionTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/sba.transactiontimeout/vb/services.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否使用当前同步上下文来选择执行的线程。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to use the current synchronization context to choose the thread of execution.

value.span: 如果对服务的所有调用都必须在 指定的线程上运行，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if all calls to the service must run on the thread specified by the ; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以提供某些应用程序所需的用户界面线程关联。Use this property to provide the user interface thread affinity that some applications require. 例如，Windows 窗体应用程序可能被注册为单一实例服务对象。For example, a Windows Forms application may be registered as a singleton service object. 在这种情况下，对该服务的所有调用都必须在 Windows 窗体线程上运行。In this case, all calls into the service must run on the Windows Forms thread. 默认情况下， 设置为 `true`，这会使对该服务的所有调用都同步在从 捕获的线程上运行。The default case, in which is set to `true`, synchronizes all calls to the service to run on the thread captured from the .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是由系统还是由应用程序强制执行 SOAP 标头处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the system or the application enforces SOAP header processing.

value.span: 如果由系统执行 SOAP 标头 处理，则为 ，否则为 ，这表示由应用程序执行此处理。

span.span: if the system is to perform SOAP header processing; otherwise , which indicates that the application performs this processing.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来关闭对到达的消息头强制执行验证。Use the property to turn off the enforced validation of arriving message headers. 在正常执行过程中，将消息头与 属性进行比较，来确认是否由服务显式处理到达的消息。In normal execution, message headers are compared against the property to confirm that arriving headers are explicitly handled by the service. 将此属性设置为 `false` 可以禁用此检查。Set this to `false` to disable this checking. 当设置为 `false` 时，应用程序必须检查有 MustUnderstand="true" 标记的标头，如果其中一个或多个标头没有被理解，则返回错误。When set to `false`, the application must check for headers marked with MustUnderstand="true" and return a fault if one or more of them were not understood. 当应用程序应接受任何传入的 SOAP 消息（例如，使用类型化消息或非类型化消息）以及执行自定义标头处理时，这将很有用。This is useful when the application is supposed to accept any incoming SOAP messages (for example, when using typed or untyped messages) and perform custom header processing.
